title: The Golden Dagger
synopsis: A renowned antique collector is found dead in his locked study, a priceless golden dagger missing from its display. Was it a robbery gone wrong or something more sinister?

title: The Silent Starlet
synopsis: A rising movie star vanishes from her movie set without a trace. The only clue is a cryptic note left in her dressing room. Did she run away or was she taken?

title: The Dockside Deception
synopsis: An informant is found dead by the foggy docks, just hours before he was set to expose a major smuggling ring. The police rule it an accident, but you're not so sure.
